origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenBuildingAPI.get_stock_performance', 'description': 'This function retrieves the stock performance data for specified green building companies over a given time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company_names', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of company names to retrieve stock performance data for.'}, {'name': 'time_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for the stock performance data, e.g., six_months, one_year.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'stock_data', 'description': 'The stock performance data for the specified companies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenBuildingAPI.get_stock_performance, 它的参数输入如下: 'company_names'是['CompanyA', 'CompanyB'], 'time_period'是'six_months'.
